mapper.insert: INSERT INTO breply(BREPLYNO, BREPLYCONT, BREPLYIMG, BREPLYSAVED, BREPLYTHUMB, BREPLYSIZE, BREPLYDATE, BREPLYPASSWD, boardno, accountno, managerno) VALUES(breply_seq.nextval, #{breplycont}, #{breplyimg}, #{breplysaved}, #{breplythumb}, #{breplysize}, sysdate, #{breplypasswd}, #{boardno}, #{accountno}, #{managerno})
mapper.select: SELECT m.mid AS id, r.breplyno, r.boardno, r.managerno AS entityno, r.breplycont, r.breplydate, r.breplyimg, r.breplythumb, 'manager' AS entity_type FROM manager m JOIN breply r ON m.managerno = r.managerno WHERE r.managerno > 0 AND r.boardno = #{boardno} UNION ALL SELECT a.aid AS id, r.breplyno, r.boardno, r.accountno AS entityno, r.breplycont, r.breplydate, r.breplyimg, r.breplythumb, 'account' AS entity_type FROM account a JOIN breply r ON a.accountno = r.accountno WHERE r.accountno > 0 AND r.boardno = #{boardno} ORDER BY breplyno DESC

SELECT m.mid AS id, r.breplyno, r.boardno, r.managerno AS entityno, r.breplycont, r.breplydate, r.breplythumb,'manager' AS entity_type FROM manager m JOIN breply r ON m.managerno = r.managerno WHERE r.managerno > 0 AND r.boardno = #{boardno} UNION ALL SELECT a.aid AS id, r.breplyno, r.boardno, r.accountno AS entityno, r.breplycont, r.breplydate, r.breplythumb,'account' AS entity_type FROM account a JOIN breply r ON a.accountno = r.accountno WHERE r.accountno > 0 AND r.boardno = #{boardno}+ AND ROWNUM < 300 ORDER BY breplyno DESC
